Interface Search


  • @Role
public interface Search
    XWiki Search API.
    Version:
    $Id$

    • Method Detail

      • deleteDocumentIndex

        boolean deleteDocumentIndex(org.xwiki.model.reference.DocumentReference document)
        Delete the index for document.
        Parameters:
        document - Document reference to which index needs to be deleted.
        Returns:
        true if document index deletion is successful.

      • getCurrentIndexerProcess

        IndexerProcess getCurrentIndexerProcess()
        Object with indexing process metadata.
        Returns:
        IndexProcess object for the active indexing process.

      • getImplementation

        String getImplementation()
        Gets the backend implementation.It could be embedded Solr, remote Solr, internal Lucene, distributed Lucene.
        Returns:
        the implementation.

      • indexDocument

        boolean indexDocument(org.xwiki.model.reference.DocumentReference document)
        Index the document.
        Parameters:
        document - reference to the document to be indexed.
        Returns:
        true if document indexing is successful.

      • indexDocuments

        int indexDocuments(List<org.xwiki.model.reference.DocumentReference> documents)
        Index the documents.
        Parameters:
        documents - List of documents to be indexed.
        Returns:
        the Number of documents scheduled for indexing. -1 in case of errors.

      • parseQuery

        org.apache.solr.client.solrj.SolrQuery parseQuery()
        Parses the query entered by the user into the Solrquery object.
        Returns:
        the solrQuery object.

      • rebuildFarmIndex

        int rebuildFarmIndex()
        Rebuilds the index for the whole wiki farm.
        Returns:
        the Number of documents scheduled for indexing. -1 in case of errors.

      • rebuildFarmIndex

        int rebuildFarmIndex(List<org.xwiki.model.reference.WikiReference> wikis)
        Rebuilds the index for the given wiki's in a wiki farm.
        Parameters:
        wikis - List of wikis to be indexed.
        Returns:
        the Number of documents scheduled for indexing. -1 in case of errors.

      • rebuildWikiIndex

        int rebuildWikiIndex()
        Rebuilds the index for the current wiki.
        Returns:
        the Number of documents scheduled for indexing. -1 in case of errors

      • rebuildWikiIndex

        int rebuildWikiIndex(List<org.xwiki.model.reference.SpaceReference> spaces)
        Rebuilds the index for given spaces in the current wiki.
        Parameters:
        spaces - List of spaces to be indexed
        Returns:
        the Number of documents scheduled for indexing. -1 in case of errors

      • search

        SearchResponse search(String query)
        Search for the query in the current wiki for all the languages.
        Parameters:
        query - to be searched.
        Returns:
        SearchResponse to the query searched.

      • search

        SearchResponse search(String query,
                    List<String> languages)
        Search for the query in the current wiki for given languages.
        Parameters:
        query - to be searched.
        languages - to be searched.
        Returns:
        SearchResponse to the query searched.

      • search

        SearchResponse search(String query,
                    List<String> languages,
                    org.xwiki.model.reference.WikiReference wikiReference)
        Search for the query in the current wiki for given languages in a wiki.
        Parameters:
        query - to be searched.
        languages - Wiki reference to be searched for the query.
        wikiReference - Space reference to be searched for the query.
        Returns:
        SearchResponse to the query searched.

      • search

        SearchResponse search(String query,
                    List<String> languages,
                    org.xwiki.model.reference.WikiReference wiki,
                    org.xwiki.model.reference.SpaceReference space)
        Search for the query in the current wiki for given languages in a wiki and space.
        Parameters:
        query - to be searched.
        languages - List of document languages to search
        wiki - Wiki reference to be searched for the query.
        space - Space reference to be searched for the query.
        Returns:
        SearchResponse to the query searched.
